Nilesh Thali wrote:

> Hi,
> Don't want to start any religious wars, but just curious:
> Why wouldn't we want to maybe have an option to test all methods of a
> class,
> even the ones which are private ?

JUnit can do that already. Just code your unit tests as inner classes. 
This gives them access to private methods in the enclosing class.
